name: Protestants
description:
Game Concept:

You are protestor manager, and you have convoked all population to fight for your purpose and make the chaos in the city.

Controls:

Use the left click button to move on the game.

Creators: 

 Marcos Brasil - Sounds Designer

 André Bock- 3D Artist
